The claim was shared on Facebook on May: 2020, and included a video taken from a news segment about remdesivir as a COVID-19 treatment.
The caption of the Facebook post stated: 3. US regulators authorized the emergency use of remdesivir against COVID-19 on May 1, 2020, after it showed positive results in shortening recovery time in clinical trials.
The FDA and Gilead Sciences: the pharmaceutical company that manufactures remdesivir, both stated that remdesivir is still being studied and is not yet approved for the treatment of COVID-19.
